original_text: So Tamar went to her brother Amnon's house; and he was laid down. And she took flour, and kneaded it, and made cakes in his sight, and did bake the cakes.
korean_text: 다말이 그 오라버니 암논의 집에 이르매 그가 누웠더라 다말이 밀가루를 가지고 반죽하여 그가 보는 데서 과자를 만들고 그 과자를 굽고

sentences.original_text: So Tamar went to her brother Amnon's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다말은 그녀의 오빠 암논의 집으로 갔다

sentences.original_text: and made cakes in his sight
